description.english: Kill the tyrannical Scarecrow and liberate the crows
description.german: Erledige die tyrannische Vogelscheuche und befreie die Krähen.
description.french: Tuer l'épouvantable épouvantail et libérer les corbeaux
description.italian: Uccidi lo Spaventapasseri tiranno e libera i corvi
description.spanish: Asesina a ese Espantapájaros asqueroso y libera a los pobres cuervos
description.schinese: 杀掉暴虐的稻草人并解放乌鸦

description.turkish: Zorba korkuluğu alt et ve kargalara hükmet

description.english: Pass your abandoned minecart driving test
description.german: Bestehe die Fahrprüfung mit der alten Lore.
description.french: Passer l'examen de conduite de chariot abandonné
description.italian: Supera l'esame di guida del carrello minerario
description.spanish: Aprueba tu examen para conducir un carrito de mina abandonado
description.schinese: 通过废弃矿车的驾驶测试
description.russian: Сдайте экзамен по вождению на брошенной вагонетке
description.turkish: Yük arabası sürme testini tek parça tamamla

description.english: Find a gramophone and DANCE, DANCE, DANCE!

description.schinese: 找到留声机然后扭起来，跳起来，燥起来！

description.turkish: Gramofon bulup DANS ET!
description.arabic: !جِد أحد الغرامافونز وارقص، ارقص ثم ارقص

description.english: Ride the ghost horse all the way to the end
description.german: Reite bis zum Schluss auf dem Geisterpferd.

description.english: Make some magic mushroom music!
description.german: Spiel ein wenig magische Pilzmusik.

description.italian: Fai un po' di musica con i funghi magici!

description.schinese: 制作一些魔力蘑菇音乐！

description.turkish: Mantarlar ile güzel bir müzik yap
description.arabic: اعمل موسيقى على كمآت الفطر السحرية!

description.english: Ruin the Witch and Merchant's cruelty-free dinner
description.german: Bring die Hexe und den Händler um ihr veganes Abendessen.
description.french: Gâcher le dîner végétarien d'un heureux couple
description.italian: Rovina la cena della Strega e del Mercante
description.spanish: Arruina la cena libre de crueldad de la Bruja y el Comerciante
description.schinese: 摧毁女巫和商人的人道主义晚餐
description.russian: Сорвите ненасильственный ужин ведьмы и торговца
description.turkish: Cadı ve Tüccar'ın masum randevusunu boz
description.arabic: أفسد على الساحرة و التاجر عشائهما الخالي من القسوة

description.english: Collect all crow skulls in the swamp

description.english: Beat the gate guards to the gate they guard on guard carts
description.german: Erreiche vor den Wachen das Tor, das sie in ihren Patrouillenwagen bewachen.
description.french: Gagner la course en éliminant 100 % des concurrents
description.italian: A bordo dei loro carrelli, batti le guardie arrivando per primo al cancello
description.spanish: Llega a la puerta antes que los guardias que se encargan de guardiar la puerta
description.schinese: 坐着守卫小车攻击城门守卫并冲向城门
description.russian: Обгоните стражников, отходящих к воротам на повозках
description.turkish: Koruma vagonlarıyla, korumaların koruduğu kapıya kadar yarış ve onları yen
description.arabic: اسبق حراس البوابات للبوابات التي يحرسونها على عربات الحراس

description.english: Win the game of Conveniently-Placed Hydraulic-Operated Underground Whack-a-Mole (patent pending)
description.german: Gewinne eine Partie „Günstig im Untergrund gelegenes, hydraulisch betriebenes Whac-A-Mole“ (Patent ist bereits angemeldet).
description.french: Jouer à tape-taupe
description.italian: Vinci allo Schiaccia la Talpa Sotterraneo a Funzionamento Idraulico Opportunamente Posizionato (in attesa di brevetto)
description.spanish: Gana el juego subterráneo de Golpea al topo operado hidráulicamente y ubicado convenientemente (patente pendiente)
description.schinese: 赢得便于放置且使用液压操作的地下打地鼠游戏（正在申请专利）
description.russian: Выиграйте раунд в удачно расположенной подземной игре «Ударь крота» с гидравлическим приводом (в ожидании патента)
description.turkish: Kolaylıkla Sığdırılmış Hidrolik Kontrollü Yer Altı Refleks Oyununu kazan (patentini alacağız yakında)
description.arabic: اربح في لعبة الأنابيب المائية التي وضعت صدفة في المكان المناسب مع فكرة لطخ الرؤوس (قيد التسجيل في الملكية الفكرية)

displayName.german: Auf die Größe kommt es gar nicht an
displayName.french: Ce n'est pas la taille qui compte
displayName.arabic: كلما كبر عن الأرض نقص شره

description.english: Be the David to Dhor's Goliath (i.e. kill the big guy)
description.german: Wenn Dhor Goliath ist, bist du David (also murks den großen Typen ab).
description.french: Être le David de Goliath (tuer le gros vilain méchant, quoi)
description.italian: Sii per Dhor ciò che Davide fu per Golia (in altre parole, uccidilo)
description.spanish: Sé el David del gran Dhor Goliat (es decir, asesina al grandote)
description.schinese: 成为击败德霍·歌利亚的大卫（也就是杀了那个大块头）
description.russian: Станьте Давидом, одолевшим голиафа Дхора (убейте здоровяка)
description.turkish: Dhor'un Dev Orso'suna karşı Tarkan ol (iri kıyım arkadaşı öldür yani)
description.arabic: اقتل السيد العملاق دور، مثل قصة جالوت

displayName.french: Une passion qui commence à devenir étrange

description.english: Go for a nice walk with Abelard the Gargoyle
description.german: Mach einen netten Ausflug mit Abelard, dem Gargoyle.
description.french: S'envoler au Septième ciel... avec une gargouille
description.italian: Fatti un giro con Abelard il gargoyle
description.spanish: Vete de paseo con la gárgola Abelardo
description.schinese: 与石像鬼阿伯拉德一同翱翔
description.russian: Отправьтесь на прелестную прогулку с горгульей Абеляром
description.turkish: Gargoyl Abelard ile kısa bir uçuş yap
description.arabic: اعمل نزهة رائقة مع أبيلارد الكرغل

displayName.english: Ain't no rest for the wicked
displayName.french: Pas de repos pour les méchants
displayName.italian: Non c'è pace per i dannati
displayName.spanish: No habrá paz para los malvados

description.english: Clear away all those headstones cluttering up the graveyard
description.german: Räume alle Grabsteine auf dem Friedhof aus dem Weg.
description.french: Virer toutes ces tombes qui encombrent le cimetière
description.italian: Distruggi tutte le lapidi disseminate per il cimitero
description.spanish: Deshazte de estas lápidas que invaden el cementerio
description.schinese: 把墓地里乱七八糟的墓碑都清理干净
description.russian: Уберите все лишние надгробия на кладбище
description.turkish: Mezarlıkta toplanmış tüm mezar taşlarını kır
description.arabic: نظف كل تلك الصخور التي تلوث جمال الحديقة

description.english: Solve world hunger (by killing Gluttony)
description.german: Löse das Welthungerproblem (indem du die Völlerei erledigst).
description.french: Stopper la faim dans le monde (en tuant Gourmandise)
description.italian: Risolvi la fame nel mondo (uccidendo l'incarnazione della gola)
description.spanish: Termina con el hambre mundial (al matar a la gula)
description.schinese: （通过杀掉暴食）解决世界上的饥荒问题
description.russian: Покончите с голодом во всём мире (убив чревоугодие)
description.turkish: Dünya açlığına çözüm getir (Oburluk'u öldür yani)
description.arabic: حل جذري لمشكلة الجوع العالمي (عن طريق قتل رمز الشراهة)

displayName.spanish: Creo que tienes un problema… óseo.

description.english: Collect all crow skulls in the graveyard

description.english: Reach the end of the vortex like a paper boat down a drain
description.german: Erreiche das Ende des Vortex wie ein Papierschiffchen im Abwasserrohr.
description.french: Traverser le vortex... vers l'infini et l'au-delà !
description.italian: Raggiungi la fine del vortice come una barchetta risucchiata da uno scarico
description.spanish: Ve hacía el final del vórtice como un barco de papel en el desagüe
description.schinese: 像下水道中的纸船一样达到漩涡的尽头
description.russian: Достигните конца воронки, словно бумажный кораблик, смытый в водосток

description.arabic: تعبر بوابة التنقل مثلما تعبر السفينة الورقية ماسورة المجاري

displayName.spanish: El peor logro de la historia

description.english: Get on Santa's Super-Duper-Duper-Naughty List
description.german: Der Weihnachtsmann nimmt dich auf seiner Liste der unglaublich Unartigen auf.
description.french: S'embrouiller avec le plus gentil des vieux monsieurs
description.italian: Guadagnati un posto nella lista di Babbo Natale dei super-mega-cattivi
description.spanish: Entra en la lista de los peores portados de Santa Claus
description.schinese: 名列圣诞老人的超级-无敌-究极-淘气名单
description.russian: Попадите в список Санты для Супер-пупер-пупернепослушных
description.turkish: Noel Baba'nın En ama En ama EN YARAMAZLAR listesine gir
description.arabic: انضم لقائمة البابا نويل في قائمة أسوء أسوء الفتيان المشاكسين

displayName.spanish: ¡Esta persona me da miedo, tiene muchos cráneos!

displayName.spanish: El chico malo más malo de todos

description.english: Kill the Wizard + Get the Amulet = Profit
description.german: Töte den Zauberer + schnapp dir das Amulett = Sieg
description.french: Tuer sorcier + prendre amulette = profit
description.italian: Uccidere il Mago + Recuperare l'amuleto = Guadagno
description.spanish: Asesina al Hechicero + Obtén el Amuleto = Victoria
description.schinese: 杀掉巫师 + 获得护符 = 收益
description.russian: Убить Волшебника + получить амулет = успех
description.turkish: Büyücü + Muska = Temiz kâr
description.arabic: قتل الساحر + أخذ التميمة = منفعة صافية

displayName.german: Ich weiß nicht, was ich anziehen soll

description.english: Fill out your wardrobe
description.german: Fülle deinen Kleiderschrank.
description.french: Remplir toute sa garde-robe
description.italian: Riempi il tuo guardaroba
description.spanish: Completa tu armario
description.schinese: 装满你的衣橱
description.russian: Заполните гардероб
description.turkish: Gardrobunu doldur
description.arabic: املأ خزانة ملابسك

description.english: Make vinyls cool again. ...Actually, that's impossible, even as a joke. Just find all the gramophones.
description.german: Bring Schallplatten wieder in Mode ... Das ist natürlich nur ein Scherz. Finde einfach alle Grammofone.
description.french: Rendre les vinyls à nouveau cools... Non, je rigole. Trouver tous les gramophones, juste.
description.italian: Fai tornare in auge i vinili... No, è impossibile, anche per scherzo. Trova tutti i grammofoni e basta.
description.spanish: ¡Que vuelvan los vinilos! En realidad… olvídalo, eso es imposible. Solo encuentra todos los gramófonos.
description.schinese: 让黑胶唱片再次流行...当然，哪怕当笑话讲，这也是不可能的。找到所有留声机就好。
description.russian: Верните моду на пластинки. Ладно, это невозможно, даже шутки ради. Просто найдите все граммофоны.
description.turkish: Viniller yine moda olsa keşke. Şakası bile imkansız geliyor kulağa yahu. Sen tüm gramofonları bul yeter.
description.arabic: اجعل أشرطة الفينيل رهيبة مرة أخرى... في الواقع، ذلك ضرب من المستحيل حتى هزارًا. جد كل الغرامافونز فحسب.

displayName.russian: С тобой точно что-то не так

description.english: Collect every single crow skull in the world
description.german: Sammle jeden einzelnen Krähenschädel auf der Welt.

description.turkish: Diyardaki tüm karga kafataslarını bul
description.arabic: اجمع كل واحدة من جماجم الغربان الموجودة في العالم

description.english: Give in to your inner completionist
description.german: Gib dich ganz deiner Sammelsucht hin.
description.french: À la gloire d'un perfectionniste
description.italian: Scatena il completista che è in te
description.spanish: Hazle caso a tu coleccionista interior
description.schinese: 屈服于你内心的完美主义
description.russian: Поддайтесь внутреннему перфекционисту
description.turkish: İçindeki o mükemmelliyetçiyi serbest bırak
description.arabic: أترك العنان لجنون هوسك الكامن باكمال كل شيء

description.english: Kill the Phantom guarding the ancient mines
description.german: Besiege das Phantom, das die alten Minen bewacht.
description.french: Re-tuer le gardien (déjà mort) de la Mine hantée
description.italian: Uccidi il Fantasma che sorveglia le antiche miniere
description.spanish: Asesina al Fantasma que cuida las viejas minas
description.schinese: 杀掉守卫古老矿井的幻影
description.russian: Убейте фантома, охраняющего древний рудник
description.turkish: Kadim madenleri koruyan Tayf'ı öldür
description.arabic: اقتل الطيف الذي يحرس المنجم المهجور
